state_description: This screen displays the results of a completed scan of the Trash Bins, showing the amount of space that can be freed by emptying the trash. Users can review details of the files found or proceed to empty the trash.

enables.name: Review Details
enables.description: View more information about the files found in the trash bins.

enables.name: Empty Trash
enables.description: Proceed to empty the trash bins and free up space.

enables.name: Start Over
enables.description: Restart the scan process from the beginning.
